text: Let the splintered bones burrow from the grave pall. Let cold fingers grip tomb-worn blades, and unseeing eyes survey the fields of slaughter. For your time has come once more.
An ethereal cascade of necromantic energy is loosed upon the enemy!
Nagash's Grand Vizier Arkhan is masterfully adept in the art of Necromancy that he can summon forth endless hordes of undead minions to do his bidding.
